main.title: XA320 High-Density Server Node
main.text: The XA320 High-Density Server Node is a 1U, half-width, 2-socket server node for the TaiShan X6000 high-density server. Powered by Huaweiâ€™s 64-bit Kunpeng 920 processors, the server node provides a total of 128 cores running at 2.6 GHz.
bottomTip1: Move the mouse to rotate the model
bottomTip2: Move the mouse to move the model
bottomTip3: Move the mouse to zoom in or out the model
pcie_node: Up to 1 PCIe 4.0 x16 and 1 PCIe 4.0 x8 slots
boardnic_node: 2 x GE electrical ports + 1 x 100GE optical port, or 2 x GE electrical ports + 2 x 10GE/25GE optical ports
raid_node: RAID 0, 1, 5, 6, 10, 50, or 60, supercapacitor for power failure protection</br>* The liquid-cooled TaiShan X6000 XA320 V2 supports only RAID 0, 1
